forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.
